content: If you look at docs#Profinite, you'll see (is_totally_disconnected : totally_disconnected_space ↥(self.to_CompHaus)). But actually the definition uses [is_totally_disconnected : totally_disconnected_space ↥(self.to_CompHaus)]. Do we want to fix doc-gen to correctly show the bracket types of the constructor?
Right now it also doesn't show the name of the constructor
